languages.text: {n}Вы перебираете в голове самых жутких тварей Фенриса, но мысль почему-то крутится вокруг странного названия: "гнев-барсук". Кажется, вы читали об этом животном — небольшой и лютый зверь, про которого мало что известно.{/n}

{n}You mentally go through the list of the deadliest creatures on Fenris, but your thoughts seem to settle on one strange name: "wrath-badger." You have read about this animal — a small and ferocious creature about which very little is known.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы перебираете в голове самых жутких тварей Фенриса, но мысль почему-то крутится вокруг странного названия: "гнев-барсук". Кажется, вы читали об этом животном — небольшой и лютый зверь, про которого мало что известно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You mentally go through the list of the deadliest creatures on Fenris, but your thoughts seem to settle on one strange name: "wrath-badger." You have read about this animal — a small and ferocious creature about which very little is known.{/n}

{n}You mentally go through the list of the deadliest creatures on Fenris, but your thoughts seem to settle on one strange name: "wrath-badger." You have read about this animal — a small and ferocious creature about which very little is known.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的脑海中回想着整个芬里斯最致命的生物，最终，你的想法停留在“怒獾”这个古怪的名字上。你读过关于这种动物的文章，这是一种体格小巧、性情凶暴的生物，人们对它知之甚少。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You mentally go through the list of the deadliest creatures on Fenris, but your thoughts seem to settle on one strange name: "wrath-badger." You have read about this animal — a small and ferocious creature about which very little is known.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的脑海中回想着整个芬里斯最致命的生物，最终，你的想法停留在“怒獾”这个古怪的名字上。你读过关于这种动物的文章，这是一种体格小巧、性情凶暴的生物，人们对它知之甚少。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Repasas mentalmente una lista de las criaturas más letales de Fenris, pero tus pensamientos se detienen en una: el «tejón furioso». Has leído algo de este animal: es pequeño y feroz y no se sabe mucho sobre él.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You mentally go through the list of the deadliest creatures on Fenris, but your thoughts seem to settle on one strange name: "wrath-badger." You have read about this animal — a small and ferocious creature about which very little is known.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Repasas mentalmente una lista de las criaturas más letales de Fenris, pero tus pensamientos se detienen en una: el «tejón furioso». Has leído algo de este animal: es pequeño y feroz y no se sabe mucho sobre él.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたはフェンリスで最も凶暴な生き物のリストに目を通したが、ある奇妙な名前「ラス・バッジャー」が目についた。あなたはこの動物について読んだことがある…小さくて獰猛な生き物だが、ほとんど知られていない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You mentally go through the list of the deadliest creatures on Fenris, but your thoughts seem to settle on one strange name: "wrath-badger." You have read about this animal — a small and ferocious creature about which very little is known.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたはフェンリスで最も凶暴な生き物のリストに目を通したが、ある奇妙な名前「ラス・バッジャー」が目についた。あなたはこの動物について読んだことがある…小さくて獰猛な生き物だが、ほとんど知られていない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du kommst im Kopf die Liste der tödlichsten Kreaturen auf Fenris durch, doch deine Gedanken bleiben an einem merkwürdigen Namen hängen: "Zornesdachs." Du hast von diesem Tier gelesen, einem kleinen und wilden Geschöpf, über das nicht viel bekannt ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You mentally go through the list of the deadliest creatures on Fenris, but your thoughts seem to settle on one strange name: "wrath-badger." You have read about this animal — a small and ferocious creature about which very little is known.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du kommst im Kopf die Liste der tödlichsten Kreaturen auf Fenris durch, doch deine Gedanken bleiben an einem merkwürdigen Namen hängen: "Zornesdachs." Du hast von diesem Tier gelesen, einem kleinen und wilden Geschöpf, über das nicht viel bekannt ist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous parcourez mentalement la liste des créatures les plus meurtrières de Fenris, mais votre esprit semble s'arrêter sur un bien étrange nom : le « blaireau colérique ». Vous avez lu des choses sur cet animal : une créature petite et féroce dont on ne sait que bien peu de choses.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You mentally go through the list of the deadliest creatures on Fenris, but your thoughts seem to settle on one strange name: "wrath-badger." You have read about this animal — a small and ferocious creature about which very little is known.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous parcourez mentalement la liste des créatures les plus meurtrières de Fenris, mais votre esprit semble s'arrêter sur un bien étrange nom : le « blaireau colérique ». Vous avez lu des choses sur cet animal : une créature petite et féroce dont on ne sait que bien peu de choses.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aklından Fenris'teki en ölümcül yaratıkları sıralıyorsun ama düşüncelerin tuhaf bir isimde karar kılıyor: "gazap porsuğu." Bu hayvan hakkında bir şeyler okumuştun. Hakkında pek az şey bilinen, küçük ve öfkeli bir yaratık.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You mentally go through the list of the deadliest creatures on Fenris, but your thoughts seem to settle on one strange name: "wrath-badger." You have read about this animal — a small and ferocious creature about which very little is known.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aklından Fenris'teki en ölümcül yaratıkları sıralıyorsun ama düşüncelerin tuhaf bir isimde karar kılıyor: "gazab-ı porsuk." Bu hayvan hakkında bir şeyler okumuştun. Hakkında pek az şey bilinen, küçük ve öfkeli bir yaratık.{/n}
